title: Parents and children
creator_credit: Dick Foster and Eurfron Gwynne Jones
brief_description: The understanding and role of children in different societies, eg education system and valued roles. Highlighting various children in an education environment and the role of the educational bodies in diverse political systems. For example: collective education and education for the individual
